subtitle: This is an ideal recipe if serving for a party, but it may be halved for smaller quantities.

method.text: Place chicken, onions and oil in a partially covered dish and cook on High/100% for 9 min, stirring twice.
Add other ingredients. Cover and cook on High/100% for about 8 min, stirring twice.
Allow to stand for 2 min before serving.

title: Chicken with lemon sauce - microwave
